sourcesContent:
<template>
    <b-dropdown id="dropdown" text="Options">
        <b-dropdown-item 
            v-for="provider in providers"
            :key="provider.id"
            @click="changeProvider(provider)">
            {{provider}}
        </b-dropdown-item>
    </b-dropdown>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters, mapState, mapMutations } from 'vuex'
export default {
    computed: {
        ...mapState({
            providers: state => state.providers.all
        })
    },
    methods: {
        ...mapMutations([
            'changeProvider'
        ])
    },
    created () {
        this.$store.dispatch('providers/getAllProviders')
    }
}
</script>
